name: The Original Human Torch
description: The Original Human Torch was not born but built. Created by the brilliant Professor Phineas T. Horton, the android burst into flames when first exposed to oxygen. Eventually, the synthetic man learned to control the flames that wreathed his body and vowed to help humanity. From the battlefields of the Second World War to the streets of modern cities, the Original Human Torch burns brightly to banish the darkness of the world.
